item.title: End-to-End Testing in Gitlab CI with Testcontainers and LocalStack: Understanding Runners and Docker in Docker
item.description: Introduction: Testcontainers & LocalStack Testcontainers is an open-source framework that provides lightweight APIs for bootstrapping local development and test dependencies with real services wrapped in Docker containers. Running tests with Testcontainers and LocalStack is crucial for AWS-powered applications because it ensures each test runs in a clean, isolated environment, providing consistency across all development and CI machines. LocalStack avoids AWS costs by emulating services locally, preventing exceeding AWS free tier limits, and eliminates reliance on potentially unstable external AWS services.
